iti91:2.3: Tanca kho etam, bhikkhave, kulaputta upenti atthavasika, atthavasam paticca;
iti91:2.4: neva rajabhinita, na corabhinita, na inatta, na bhayatta, na ajivikapakata.
iti91:2.5: Api ca kho ‘otinnamha jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi dukkhotinna dukkhapareta,
iti91:2.6: appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayetha’ti.
iti91:2.8: So ca hoti abhijjhalu kamesu tibbasarago, byapannacitto padutthamanasankappo, mutthassati asampajano asamahito vibbhantacitto pakatindriyo.
iti91:2.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, chavalatam ubhatopadittam majjhe guthagatam neva game katthattham pharati na aranne;
iti91:2.10: tathupamaham, bhikkhave, imam puggalam vadami gihibhoga parihino samannatthanca na paripureti”ti.
iti91:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
